channel.item:
Snickers Varieties and Lays Cappuccino Chips http://tobyblog.com/posts/snickers-varieties-and-lays-cappuccino-chips/ Sat, 09 Aug 2014 21:38:00 +0000 (Toby Marks) http://tobyblog.com/posts/snickers-varieties-and-lays-cappuccino-chips/

To celebrate the recent one year anniversary of our father/son Tumblr site, TheVCubeSolver and I teamed up to review an assortment of Snickers bars we found at CVS. And as a special bonus, we take a look at the trendy new Lays Cappuccino potato chips. Enjoy.
